about.title: Hello, I'm Anderson
about.description: I am a Full Stack Developer passionate about creating interactive and responsive interfaces. With a degree in Information Systems from Anhanguera Educacional, I have over 3 years of experience working with modern technologies such as ReactJS, TypeScript, JavaScript, NextJS, Redux, NodeJS, Express, MongoDB, and Docker.

form.name: Name
form.error: An error occurred. Please try again.

experiences.company: Secretariat of Justice of the Federal District
description: Made significant adjustments and improvements to the NaHora website using HTML, CSS, WordPress, and Bootstrap.
Actively participated in code reviews and project meetings, contributing to the adoption of best practices and agile methodologies such as Kanban and Scrum.
Conducted rigorous testing in the staging environment of the AgendaDF system.
Development of interactive dashboards using ReactJS and TypeScript, providing efficient and visually appealing data analysis.
Creation of highly functional and responsive Landing Pages with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, improving conversion and user experience.
Integration with relational and non-relational databases, including Postgres, MySQL, and MongoDB.
Effective collaboration with back-end teams using NodeJS.
Version control management using Git and GitHub.
Implemented new functionalities and user interfaces using React and TypeScript, thereby improving the overall user experience.
Actively participated in code reviews and project meetings, contributing to the adoption of best practices and agile methodologies such as Scrum.
Implementation of systems for companies like Domino's Pizza and Globo.
Software Development: Design, develop, and maintain web applications using technologies such as React, TypeScript, JavaScript, RESTFUL APIs, and other relevant technologies.
Team Collaboration: Work closely with design and back-end teams to deliver complete and efficient solutions, ensuring an excellent user experience.
Good Programming Practices: Implement and follow good programming practices, including SOLID, Clean Code, and agile methodologies like Scrum and Kanban.
State Management and Hooks: Use Context API for state management, as well as implement hooks like useState, useEffect, and customHooks.
Responsiveness and Design: Develop responsive and accessible interfaces to provide a consistent user experience across different devices.
